February 4, 2015, Hilda worked with Richard in different groups

I had a chance to work with Richard on a Cognos BI Tool Implementation initiative where we were responsible for delivering enterprise-scale Cognos BI to Field, Protiviti, and Corporate business users utilizing Amazon Services.  Richard performed the duties of our solution architect, coming up with the sizing, enterprise architecture design for 250 concurrent users, and facilitated many design discussions with the application and security teams. Richard brought exceptional architectural and development experience in AWS.  Richard has been an outstanding mentor, able to explain complex concepts in a way that is accessible to IT professionals as well as non-technical business customers.  Richard earns my highest respect and recommendation.

James Wetzig
Senior Manager, Architecture and Infrastructure Platform Delivery at Robert Half
February 2, 2015, James managed Richard directly

I had the privilege of having Richard on my Architecture team for three years at Robert Half.  This was a transformative time for the company, as we were in the process of developing the strategy for leveraging the public cloud for our new project initiatives.  Richard was an integral part of the team that led the transformation from traditional IT delivery to a Devops-like model.  We developed highly-available and scalable architectures in AWS, leveraging automated builds and processes, all while marketing the benefits of leveraging the "Cloud" infrastructure for deploying applications.  Richard was at the forefront of this effort, and even designed and deployed our first production application in AWS, which was a fully-automated and self-recovering application that is used across the enterprise.  I always appreciated Richard's thoughtful and analytical approach to Architecture, and his ability and willingness to work with anyone and everyone to solve problems and meet deadlines.  Richard is an Architect by title, but a true technology evangelist by practice, partnering with colleagues and customers to make sure that everyone understood the direction we were taking, as well as the details of the technologies we were using.  While I will miss Richard's dedication and passion for technology, I'm happy to know that he will continue to accomplish great things, and will be a tremendous asset to his new company.  I look forward to hearing about his successes, and hopefully we will get to work together again in the future.

Chalon Mullins
Principal Enterprise Architect at Kaiser Permanente IT
March 13, 2009, Richard worked with Chalon in the same group

Richard is a great asset to any technology organization.  He was a key to how well the technology governance function ran at Schwab.  Governance frequently gets a lot of resistance, but Richard was key to help setting up a function that minimized the overhead -- making the governance deliverables as much a part of the regular workstream as possible -- and simplified and automated the feedback process so that turnaround for projects was extremely quick.  This is governance the way it was meant to be run.This was the main role in which I worked with Richard, but from our discussions I have no doubt he is also a great asset in the network and systems management space.  It has been a real pleasure for me to work with Richard in my time at Schwab.

Technical Management, Business Intelligence and Data Services at Robert Half International
February 15, 2015, Richard worked with Hilda in different groups

I had the privilege of working with Hilda on a major BI development project.  At the time, Hilda lead the BI team at Robert Half.  Rarely have I worked with someone who commanded such respect from her team without injecting her own ego or pre-judgement.  As a business partner, she was an active communicator and a positive force on the project.  On several occasions, when the project encountered obstacles, Hilda dealt with them calmly and positively, without directing blame.  At the same time, she was not hesitant to point out deficiencies and the need for improvement.In summary, Hilda is an excellent manager and leader.  I would not hesitate to recommend her for any appropriate position.
